images.copyright: Achaches lookout, El Valle de la Luna, Chile (© Ignacio Palacios/Getty Images)
images.title: In the Valley of the Moon
images.caption: El Valle de la Luna, Chile
images.desc: El Valle de la Luna (the Valley of the Moon) is located in the Atacama Desert of northern Chile. The Achaches Lookout, seen here, offers breathtaking views of volcanoes in the distance. In 1982, El Valle de la Luna was declared a nature sanctuary for its stunning, untouched habitat and its peculiar lunar-like terrain.
images.bsTitle: In the Valley of the Moon
